name: distaste
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dislike of something that you find unpleasant or unacceptable: His distaste for publicity of any sort is well known. She looked at the advertisement with distaste before walking quickly on. Synonyms
antipathy
aversion

a dislike of something because you consider it unpleasant or unacceptable: She has a distaste for hot, humid weather. distasteful adjective us
